QuestData.Title: Aiding Azure Span
QuestData.Description:
The oathstone's energy cannot be reclaimed until the ley lines within the Azure Span are repaired.
Some ley lines may only be reachable by those of Kalecgos's skills... but you may still be of aid.
If they still yet survive, seek out the tuskarr. They lived here in my times and have a deep knowledge of the land.
Speak with one of our arcane aids to return to your allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Noriko the All-Remembering in Camp Antonidas.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Noriko the All-Remembering within Camp Antonidas.
QuestData.RewardText: The tuskarr? There are a number of tuskarr merchants and travellers who pass through here.
